mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM interface_info i LEFT JOIN data_source_info d ON i.`DATA_SOURCE_ID` = d.`DATA_SOURCE_ID` LEFT JOIN interface_type_info t ON i.`TYPE_ID` = t.`TYPE_ID` LEFT JOIN interface_label_info l ON i.`LABEL_ID` = l.`LABEL_ID` WHERE i.`INTERFACE_ID` = #{interfaceId}
